ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea self-cleaning dress
ThingDef.description: Made of advanced self-cleaning fabrics, the dress is effective in keeping surfaces clean, while the upper vest adds a touch of vibrancy to itself, and most of Oberonia Aurea's researchers enjoy wearing them.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea ceremonial dress
ThingDef.description: The ceremonial dress Oberonia Aurea ratkin wear during the time of festivities. Glossy textiles, exquisite workmanship, the gown brings a sense of noble aura.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea court suit
ThingDef.description: Oberonia Aurea court suit. Elegantly crafted, yet the durable fabric and corset provide uncompromising protection.

ThingDef.label: Blitz combat uniform
ThingDef.description: The uniform of the Oberonia Aurea assualt squad is made of a special dense fabric that provides superior protection and insulation from the heat. Its skirt part is made of tearable hemostatic fabric that can be torn off and used as a bandage during battle. \n\nThe bleeding rate is reduced to 75% when worn.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea research garb
ThingDef.description: This attire is made from self-cleaning fabric, featuring a neat and visually appealing surface. Equipped with a portable analyzer and synthesizer on the waist, it enables on-the-go experimentation and quick realization of "Eureka!"s.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea one-piece dress
ThingDef.description: One of the common Oberonia Aurea everyday dresses. Its thick shawl is effective against the cold, and the iris sash bow tied around the waistband adds a touch of elegance to this already aesthetically pleasing outfit.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea short skirt
ThingDef.description: Clothing produced by the Oberonia Aurea Empire after exposure to galactic culture. The Oberonia Aurea short dress skirt is more bold and vibrant than traditional clothing, and is well insulated.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea classic long dress
ThingDef.description: One of the common Oberonia Aurea everyday dresses. the classic cut is very popular among the Oberonia Aurea Ratkin, and the multi-layer design provides good insulation from the cold.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea iris dress
ThingDef.description: One of the common Oberonia Aurea everyday dresses. The iconic large iris sash bow is always so eye-catching and beautiful.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea snow dress
ThingDef.description: One of the common Oberonia Aurea travelling attires. This multi-layer, padded skirt is actually more than enough to keep you warm, even in a blizzard.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea shawl dress
ThingDef.description: One of the common Oberonia Aurea everyday dresses. It is lighter and thinner compared to other Oberonia Aurea traditional garments.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea traveling robe
ThingDef.description: One of the common Oberonia Aurea travelling attires. The thicker outer skirt and shawl insulate and protect the body, and most Oberonia Aurea travelers choose to wear this garment on their trips.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea snow coat
ThingDef.description: One of the common Oberonia Aurea travelling attires. Its multiple layers of padding insulate the garment from the cold and the loose fit doesn't impede movement, top choice for the vast majority of travellers in colder regions.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea ribbon
ThingDef.description: Ribbons are the most common decorative accessory in the Oberonia Aurea culture. Whether it is for recognizing of meritorious service, or to express status, or simply for decorative purposes, ribbons fulfill these needs.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea honor ribbon
ThingDef.description: The Ribbon of Honor has a more elaborate pattern than common ribbons. Golden irises, the symbol of the Oberonia Aurea Empire, were embroidered on it. Honor ribbons are often worn during the coronation ceremonies and daily travels of nobles. Aesthetics aside, the ribbon is more of symbol of imperial honor.

ThingDef.label: Shockproof vest
ThingDef.description: The standard equipment of the Oberonia Aurea assualt squad. The wholebody is made of extremely tough bulletproof fabric, and the inside of the undershirt was designed with varies sophisticated cushioning structures, which can significantly reduce the impact and damage received. \n\nReduce damage received to 80% when worn.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea long trench coat
ThingDef.description: A common type of coat found in Oberonia Aurea Empire. The long tail is designed to keep out of the wind and insulate.

ThingDef.label: Blizt combat trench coat
ThingDef.description: The standardized trench coat equipped by the Oberonia Aurea assault squad. The coat is designed with internal laminated layers for effective impact mitigation, and its specialized fabric can counter conventional detection methods.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea court trench coat
ThingDef.description: The type of coat dressed in the Oberonia Aurea court.Its more delicate and beautiful textiles symbolize the status of a member of the court.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea shawl
ThingDef.description: The common Oberonia Aurea item of clothing. It is highly prized within the Oberonia Aurea Empire for its aesthetics.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea winter shawl
ThingDef.description: A type of shawl that provides good cold insulation and is popular in the cold Oberonia Aurea colonies.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea winter robe
ThingDef.description: Heavy robes that require fine work of fabrication. The robes are practical and aesthetically pleasing, and are popular in the cold Oberonia Aurea colonies.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea ceremonial robe
ThingDef.description: The Oberonia Aurea ceremonial gowns that were commonly worn to celebrate large-scale traditional festivals. It glossy and warm textile surface radiates an elegant aura, as if it was heavenly made.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea square hat
ThingDef.description: A popular hexgonal shape hat of Oberonia Aurea Empire. It is also called barn hat for its resemblance of traditional cylinder barn.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea silver-leaf hairpin
ThingDef.description: Classically styled olive leaf hair ornament with a variety of patterns.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea court silver-leaf hairpin
ThingDef.description: A silver leaf hairpin with a microcomputer embedded. Can somewhat alleviate the daily chores of the court members.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea scouter
ThingDef.description: A compact monocle with analytical capability. It can analyze the compositions of objects, or provide varies of assistance in reasearches. \n\n"You have a power level of only five. Huh, pitiful."

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea silver-rose hairpin
ThingDef.description: Carefully woven hairpin that resembles a shape of white rose flower. The attached silver leaf emits innocent purity.

ThingDef.label: Light Blitz combat helmet
ThingDef.description: The combat helmet is made of extremely tough bulletproof composite. It utilizes Oberonia Aurea uranium expertise for superior safety. In addition, the helmet is equipped with a small combat assist system to improve shooting accuracy.

ThingDef.label: Full protection Blitz combat helmet
ThingDef.description: The combat helmet is made of extremely tough bulletproof composite. It focuses on protection enhancement and combat assistance, helps the heavy weaponry operators concentrating more on fire support.

ThingDef.label: Blitz combat ballistic plate
ThingDef.description: Specialized ballistic platesheet that are thin and lightweight but provide extra ballistic protection. Barely visable from outside, the thin plate is inserted inside the outer layer clothes when equiped.

ThingDef.label: Blitz combat belt
ThingDef.description: An ergonomically designed combat belt slightly increases protection and carrying capacity.

ThingDef.label: Multifunctional utility belt
ThingDef.description: This utility belt allows for the attachment of various modular components. Its built-in common tools and assistance gadges increase work efficiency and work safety.

ThingDef.label: ECM device
ThingDef.description: A jamming device capable of disrupting the operation of electronic items. Significantly reduces the accuracy of automatic defenses such as turrets.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea traveler's Kit
ThingDef.description: Essential items for Oberonia Aurea travelers. Includes a signal beacon, a communication device, an electronic analyzer, an encyclopedia, and a range of other common survival equipment.

ThingDef.label: Blitz combat smoke launcher
ThingDef.description: A launcher capable of projecting smoke shells over long distances, often carried by Oberonia Aurea assualt squad during the assaults on plains terrains.

ThingDef.label: Oberonia Aurea mineral detector
ThingDef.description: A mineral detector used by the geologists and miners of the Oberonia Aurea Empire. It is able to maximize the detection of mineral reserves and aid in mining operations.

ThingDef.label: Colony info exchange card
ThingDef.description: A common communication card used in Oberonia Aurea Empire. With easily accessible all sorts of daliy need information stored, it provides convenience in office work, and keeps the user well-informed of the affairs between colonies.

ThingDef.label: Stasis factor recovery device
ThingDef.description: A medical device that continuously emits minute amounts of stasis factor. It significantly enhances immunity and wound healing speed when carried.
